# Set Up The Time Clock And Assign Pins To Staff

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/set-up-the-time-clock-and-assign-pins-to-staff/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
TIME CLOCK
Setting Up the Time Clock

This article covers how to set up the time clock, including:

Assigning time clock PINs to staff members

Setting up task types

Link copied
Assigning time clock PINs to staff members

Staff members will need to use their assigned PIN when clocking in and out.

To assign time clock PINs to staff members, open the Staff Members app.

Select the staff member and select Edit.

Enter a 4-digit PIN. This is what the staff member will use to clock in and out. Select Save.

Link copied
Setting up task types

Task types can be used to track paid and unpaid tasks on time cards, such as breaks, lunch, and administrative tasks.

To create a task type, go to Apps > Manage apps > Time Clock > Settings.

Select Create new task type.

Enter the Task name. Specify if the task is paid or unpaid and select Save.

Note: 

Paid task types will be included in the staff member's total hours worked.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
